title: Keepers of the Grove
description: The Keepers of the Grove are a druidic order dedicated to protecting the Grove of Gaia, a hidden grove on the island of Gnarra that is the home of the Goddess Gaian.
tenets: I must stay in contact with the druids at the grove itself, and ensure its continued safety at all times
Nature must be protected from the ravages of civilization
level1: **Child of Nature.** You have proficiency in nature checks.  If you are already proficient in nature you gain expertise instead.
level10: **Blessing of the Earth.** You learn the spell Plant Growth, and can cast it without expending a spell slot.  Once you use this ability you cannot use it again until you finish a long rest.
